text: A marshmallow is a candy that is made of sugar or corn syrup, water, and gelatin, that has been pre-softened in hot water, dextrose, and flavorings, whipped to a spongy consistency. Marshmallows are used in several types of candies, on foods, and on some drinks such as hot chocolate. == Nutritional value == The weight of a single portion of marshmallows is about (four large marshmallows or a half cup of mini marshmallows) ==References== Category:Candy
title: Marshmallow
